abstract: Biogen says its partner, Elan, has violated their deal to share ownership of the drug Tysabri. Elan says it has not.
snippet: Biogen says its partner, Elan, has violated their deal to share ownership of the drug Tysabri. Elan says it has not.
lead_paragraph: Two longtime biotechnology partners, Biogen Idec and Elan, are fighting over the rights to their big-selling multiple sclerosis drug Tysabri.

headline.main: Partners Behind an MS Drug Take Their Dispute to Court
headline.print_headline: Partners Behind an MS Drug Take Their Dispute to Court
